title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: In JDK 1.4, the 'All types' dialog is displaying obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
OB: The 'All types' dialog is currently showing obfuscated class names prominently.
EB: Obfuscated class names should be less prominent or filtered out entirely from the 'All types' dialog.
SR: To resolve this issue, I suggest either a) sorting lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter, or b) filtering out obfuscated class names completely.
